fields.name: AllowClaim
fields.description: Indicates whether another user can take ownership of the virtual machine

fields.name: ApplicableSchedule
fields.description: The applicable schedule for the virtual machine.

fields.name: ArtifactDeploymentStatus
fields.description: The artifact deployment status for the virtual machine.

fields.name: Artifacts
fields.description: The artifacts to be installed on the virtual machine.

fields.name: ComputeId
fields.description: The resource identifier (Microsoft.Compute) of the virtual machine.

fields.name: ComputeVM
fields.description: The compute virtual machine properties.

fields.name: CreatedByUser
fields.description: The email address of creator of the virtual machine.

fields.name: CreatedByUserId
fields.description: The object identifier of the creator of the virtual machine.

fields.name: CreatedDate
fields.description: The creation date of the virtual machine.

fields.name: CustomImageId
fields.description: The custom image identifier of the virtual machine.

fields.name: DataDiskParameters
fields.description: New or existing data disks to attach to the virtual machine after creation

fields.name: DisallowPublicIPAddress
fields.description: Indicates whether the virtual machine is to be created without a public IP address.

fields.name: EnvironmentId
fields.description: The resource ID of the environment that contains this virtual machine, if any.

fields.name: ExpirationDate
fields.description: The expiration date for VM.

fields.name: Fqdn
fields.description: The fully-qualified domain name of the virtual machine.

fields.name: GalleryImageReference
fields.description: The Microsoft Azure Marketplace image reference of the virtual machine.

fields.name: IsAuthenticationWithSshKey
fields.description: Indicates whether this virtual machine uses an SSH key for authentication.

fields.name: LabSubnetName
fields.description: The lab subnet name of the virtual machine.

fields.name: LabVirtualNetworkId
fields.description: The lab virtual network identifier of the virtual machine.

fields.name: LastKnownPowerState
fields.description: Last known compute power state captured in DTL

fields.name: NetworkInterface
fields.description: The network interface properties.

fields.name: Notes
fields.description: The notes of the virtual machine.

fields.name: OsType
fields.description: The OS type of the virtual machine.

fields.name: OwnerObjectId
fields.description: The object identifier of the owner of the virtual machine.

fields.name: OwnerUserPrincipalName
fields.description: The user principal name of the virtual machine owner.

fields.name: Password
fields.description: The password of the virtual machine administrator.

fields.name: PlanId
fields.description: The id of the plan associated with the virtual machine image

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

fields.name: ScheduleParameters
fields.description: Virtual Machine schedules to be created

fields.name: Size
fields.description: The size of the virtual machine.

fields.name: SshKey
fields.description: The SSH key of the virtual machine administrator.

fields.name: StorageType
fields.description: Storage type to use for virtual machine (i.e. Standard, Premium).

fields.name: UniqueIdentifier
fields.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

fields.name: UserName
fields.description: The user name of the virtual machine.

fields.name: VirtualMachineCreationSource
fields.description: Tells source of creation of lab virtual machine. Output property only.
